column1: More people remember where they were during 9/11 than any of the other historical events.
column2: Nearly everyone over 8 years old at the time remembers where they were exactly during the 9/11 attacks.
column3: Nearly everyone over 8 years old at the time remembers where they were exactly when JFK was assassinated.
column4: Nearly everyone over 8 years old at the time remembers where they were exactly when Pearl Harbor was bombed.
column5: Among the events listed, the fewest people (over 8 years old at the time) remember exactly where they were when the Berlin Wall fell.
column6: Most people over 18 years old at the time remember where they were exactly when Osama was killed.
column7: Most people over 8 years old at the time remember where they were exactly when the 1st man landed on the moon.
column8: Most people over 8 years old at the time remember where they were exactly when the Challenger exploded.
column9: Most people over 8 years old at the time remember where they were exactly when MLK was assassinated.
column10: Most people over 8 years old at the time remember where they were exactly when Nixon resigned.
column11: Most people over 8 years old at the time remember where they were exactly when the OKC bombing happened.
